definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me
to have lingering fears/trepidation remaining after a trauma (idiom)
handling a butcher's cleaver with ease (idiom); to do sth skillfully and easily
the will is there, but not the strength (idiom)/the spirit is willing but the flesh is weak
pinyin: xin1 you3 yu2 er2 li4 bu4 zu2

definition: to leave some leeway/to allow for the unpredictable
death cannot wipe out the crimes (idiom); dreadful crimes that rankled even after the perpetrator is dead
to fall short of the best but be better than the worst/can pass muster
pinyin: bi3 shang4 bu4 zu2 bi3 xia4 you3 yu2

definition: richly provided for/having enough and to spare
after that, any remaining energy (idiom from Analects); time for extracurricular activities
lit. (may you) have abundance year after year/(an auspicious saying for the Lunar New Year)
The will is there, but not the strength (idiom, from Confucian Analects)./I really want to do it, but don't have the resources./The spirit is willing but the flesh is weak.
pinyin: xin1 you3 yu2 , li4 bu4 zu2

definition: lit. to have an abundance of space/room to maneuver (idiom)
unable to accomplish anything but liable to spoil everything (idiom)/unable to do anything right/never make, but always mar
pinyin: cheng2 shi4 bu4 zu2 , bai4 shi4 you3 yu2

sentences.english: Be sure there’s spaces between things, so you’re not rushed.
sentences.chinese: 要确保每件事之间都留有余地，这样你就不会太匆忙。

sentences.english: In front of the interests of the party, they deserve to die.
sentences.chinese: 在党国利益面前，他们死有余辜。

sentences.english: Only a remnant who lives in those cities will repent.
sentences.chinese: 在那些城里，只有余民悔改。

sentences.english: I can only say that our ambition outstrips our ability.
sentences.chinese: 我只能说是心有余而力不足。

sentences.english: He was still frightened of the veterinary surgeons.
sentences.chinese: 他对外科兽医一直心有余悸。

sentences.english: Although my heart is hate, but I still love you.
sentences.chinese: 虽然我心有余恨，但是我依旧爱你。

sentences.english: In fact, it is full of the mood to do, just fall.
sentences.chinese: 其实，这是满心情愿的事情，只是心有余而力不足。

sentences.english: Surely, this is to be more than conquerors through Him who loved us.
sentences.chinese: 这就是靠着爱我们的主已得胜有余了。

sentences.english: Students friends in the industry to find jobs equal to the task.
sentences.chinese: 业大学生朋友们在找工作时游刃有余。
每次余震都让李女士心有余悸。

sentences.english: Two significant digits is good enough.
sentences.chinese: 个有效数应该绰绰有余了。

sentences.english: By following that principle I have gotten lucky with changes time and time again.
sentences.chinese: 通过采用这样的原则，我在面对变化时游刃有余。

sentences.english: This is the knot, the representative of the national anthem, every year more than the meaning of.
sentences.chinese: 这是中国结，代表吉祥如意，年年有余的意思。

sentences.english: And it's the biggest white truffle of 2008, weighing in just over a kilo.
sentences.chinese: 这是2008年最大的白松露菌，重达一千克有余。

definition: extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me
to calculate/to estimate/in total/all told/(fig.) if you think about it
taking everything into account (idiom)/when all is said and done
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
